Funnalph
Coming Soon to Alephium Testnet




What is Funnalph?

Funnalph is a Click Funnel style project on the Alephium Network. It enables anyone to create their own ALPH based click funnels, or funnalphs as we call them.

What is the purpose of Funnalph?

Everyone needs resources and funds to be able to build or contribute to the ecosystem, be it devs, influencers, projects, artists. Funnalph helps them raise these amounts in ALPH by allowing them to click click funnels. What's more is that anyone, an influencer, a regular member, or even an absolute newbie can become the "agent" for a project on Funnalph in a permissionless manner, and freely promote that project's funnel and make a sizeable amount as commission in the process.

What is in it for the ecosystem?

Alephium is a new and buzzing ecosystem, but right now, it still needs a bridge between the marketers and the builders. Funnalph is a step in that direction, by facilitating synergy between the builders (projects, artists, devs) and the marketers (influencers, cool kids).

How does it work?

Right now we are invite-only for projects. Fill the form or send us a mail @ thedarksunlabs@gmail.com with your Alephium project details. We'll get back within 7 business days.

What does it cost to create a funnel for my project on Funnalph?

Absolutely nothing! Funnalph is free and will always be free.

Which wallets are supported?

Funnalph currently supports the Alephium Wallet Extension on Chrome/Chromium. We will add more wallets once we're Mainnet ready!

How long will my Funnel be active?

Forever. But the inactive ones will get buried under the active ones on the feed.

Can I have multiple funnels?

Sorry but we're only supporting one Funnel per wallet. This is to discourage monopolization and centralization.

How are the funds distributed?

For each successful payment via a Funnel, the Project makes 90% or the amount, the Agent makes 9% of the amount, while the platform takes a 1% fee.

Who can become an Agent?

Practically anyone can become an Agent. Whether you have 500000 followers or 6, you're welcome.

Nice, where do I sign up as a project?

Just click on Apply button on the Funnels page.



Note: Funnalph is owned by The Dark Sun Labs, not affiliated to the Alephium Network team. We do NOT have any say in the price movement of the ALPH token, and hence cannot guarantee that the value of the tokens would always be more in USDT than it was at the time of funnel usage.
